title: How to Save Videos on Telegram on PC or Mac

steps.title: Open the Telegram desktop app on your computer.
steps.content: Open the Telegram desktop app on your computer. The Telegram icon looks like a white paper plane on a blue background. You can find it in your Applications folder on a Mac, or your Start menu on Windows. [1] X Research source You can download and install the desktop app from Telegram's apps page .

steps.title: Click a chat in the left panel.
steps.content: Click a chat in the left panel. Find the chat with the video you want to save in your chats list, and click it. This will open the conversation on the right-hand side. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Right-click the video you want to save.
steps.content: Right-click the video you want to save. Find the video file in the chat conversation, and right-click to see your options. It will open a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Save File As... on the menu.
steps.content: Click Save File As... on the menu. This option allows you to download and save the video file on your computer. Clicking it will open a new pop-up window and let you select a destination folder to save your video.

steps.title: Select a folder on your computer.
steps.content: Select a folder on your computer. This is where you will find your saved video after your download.

steps.title: Click Save in the pop-up.
steps.content: Click Save in the pop-up. This will download the video file and save it to the selected folder on your computer.

steps.title: Download Tampermonkey on your browser.
steps.content: Download Tampermonkey on your browser. This is a browser extension available for Google Chrome , Microsoft Edge , Safari, Opera, and Mozilla Firefox . [3] X Research source Visit the link and click Get from Store to download it to your browser. This method will only work with the web-based version of Telegram at https://web.telegram.org/k/

steps.title: Install the Telegram media downloader script.
steps.content: Install the Telegram media downloader script . This script returns the download button to channels and chats with restricted content saving. Visit the link and click Install this script at the top.

steps.title: Go to https://web.telegram.org/k/ in your web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://web.telegram.org/k/ in your web browser. If you aren't already logged in , scan the QR code or click Log in by phone number to do so now. You may also use: https://web.telegram.org/a/

steps.title: Click a private channel in the left panel.
steps.content: Click a private channel in the left panel. This will open the conversation on the right-hand side.

steps.title: Click the photo or video you want to save.
steps.content: Click the photo or video you want to save. This will open it in full view.

steps.title: Click the download button.
steps.content: Click the download button. This looks like a down arrow on top of a horizontal line. You can find this in the top-right corner. If prompted, choose a save location. Most browsers will automatically save to your desktop or Downloads folder. The photo or video will be saved to your device.
